titles: An answer to a letter from a clergyman in the city, to his friend in the country containing his reasons for not reading the declaration.
author: Poulton.
Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695. Letter from a clergyman in the city to his friend in the country.
notes: Attributed to Poulton.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Includes text of "A letter from a clergyman."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Halifax, George Savile, --  Marquis of, 1633-1695. --  Letter from a clergyman in the city to his friend in the country.
